name: VGP142_Lab01_Tan_Peter
description:
Press Escape to toggle Menu, and mouse functionality.

Press Lobby to go back to Main Menu.

Reaching the 'Beacon' Target brings you back to the Main Menu also.

- Terrain / Trees / Grass / Rock / Other Interactable Platform

- FPS / TPS Toggle F1 (See Key Bind options in Main Menu)
